description: This file defines FastAPI API routes for managing transactions, categories, and budgets in a financial tracking application. It includes endpoints for creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting these entities, as well as the associated data models and dependencies.

methods.name: create_transaction( transaction_in: TransactionCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Creates a new transaction for the authenticated user, validating the category and storing transaction details.

methods.name: list_transactions( skip: int = 0, limit: int = 50, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of transactions belonging to the current user.

methods.name: get_transaction(transaction_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Fetches a specific transaction by ID, ensuring it belongs to the current user.

methods.name: update_transaction(transaction_id: int, req: TransactionCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Updates an existing transaction, validating ownership and data integrity.

methods.name: delete_transaction(transaction_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Deletes a specific transaction, subject to ownership.

methods.name: list_categories(db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all transaction categories.

methods.name: create_category(category_in: CategoryCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new category ensuring the name is unique.

methods.name: list_budgets(db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Lists all budgets for the current user.

methods.name: create_budget(budget_in: BudgetCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Creates a new budget for the current user, validating categories if provided.

methods.name: delete_budget(budget_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Deletes a specific budget, ensuring it belongs to the current user.

methods.name: get_budget(budget_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Retrieves a specific budget by ID, with ownership validation.

methods.name: update_budget(budget_id: int, req: BudgetCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Updates an existing budget, validating ownership and provided data.
